Articles.Content:
Pro: Sleep is for the weak

Con: Boo! 120 hr work week!

To have a lightbulb in the end of your finger.

Pro: E.T. Phone Hooooooooome!!!!

Con: Hard to replace when burnt out.

The ability to bring whatever you can think of into existence.

Pros: Chick magnet.

Cons: You read a horror book.

The ability to revert time backwards and only I have memory of what happened.

Pros: Master gambler.

Cons: Get kicked out of every casino

The ability to survive anything and become immune to whatever injury/disease afflicted you.

e.g. get shot in the head and become immune to being shot in the head for the rest of your life.

Pros: Nearly Immortal

Cons: That bullet's gonna be there giving you pain for a loooong time

The ability to control the Space Kraken.

Pros: Bragging rights.

Cons: YOU CANNOT CONTROL THE MIGHTY KRAKEN PUNY MORTAL!!

The ability to breath in space.

Pros: The ability to survive in a vacuum for an indefinite duration.

Cons: You will probably freeze to death before being able to make good use of this ability.

The ability to comfortably survive in any temperature.

Pro: LOOK AT MEH IM SWIMMING IN LAVAH!

Cons: If a meteor strikes, you will probably be the only one still alive because you survived the heat... Soooo i hope you like being in a molten piece of rock for eternity...

Having your body replaced with a mech exoskeleton (I said body, not the head, so you'd still be alive)

pros: being easier to repair and customize

cons: very easy to take out the batteries of the suit

Having your hair be snakes and your eyes turn everything you look at and looks back you into stone

pros: Errmmm... You're beautiful as you are? *cough*

cons: Loneliness

The ability to have both your hands touch eachother. Maaannn, that would be awesome! *pupils dilate further*

pros: high

cons: be responsible for the abandonment of this forum game. (seriously, that was a month ago! No posts!?)

For the fear that I might scare everyone off again, I'm not posting a mutation.

Pros: No weird Mutatuion

Cons: No mutation at all!

The ability to summon Groot at will.

Pro: Yay! You can summon Groot now!... Uhh yea, no idea what those are...

Cons: They attack you randomly

Ability to survive on any liquid

Pro: Yay! You can summon Groot now!... Uhh yea, no idea what those are...

Cons: They attack you randomly

Ability to survive on any liquid

Groot is a character from Guardians of The Galaxy.

Anyways,

Pros: Drink whatever you want!

Cons: Die as you are not protected from poisoning by said liquids.

no mutation?

pros: you become a space marine!

cons:somehow you keep dying

I wish I could become a space marine

Pro: Space Guns!

Con: Space Aliens!

Mutation: the abillity to respawn 10 days after your death, at the location of your death, in the same state

pros: RESPAWN

cons: its because your a space marine

ability to make space marines appear

pros: Space Marines

cons: Eldar, Chaos forces, Tyrranids, Kroot, enslavement to a self-imposed "deity"

Ability similar to an Eldar Farseer.

pros: You're a wizard, Harry!

cons: Magic isn't real.

(I'm stupid)

The ability to reproduce.

Edited October 1, 2014 by Colserra3
Wrong forum

pros:you can do stuff

cos:you could do it anyway

MAOR SPACE MARINES

Pro: You've got protectors now, no one will steal you anything!

Cons: They're somewhere you don't know, yes, you didn't specify for them to appear near you...

The ability to turn into any animal i would like.

Pros : Undetectability in the general environment (who expects a cricket to be a person?) and special abilities.

Cons : When you become an animal, you still carry all your clothes (they blow up if you're bigger or they crush you if you're smaller)

A machinegun is melted into your arm, so that you can deploy and shoot whenever you want to.

pros: BULLETS EVERYWHERE IN ALL WHO OPPOSE YOU

cons: you are a experimatnal thing in area 51

TELEPORT

Pros: You can teleport wherever you want, yay!

Cons: You could teleport inside a volcano...

The ability to make someone i want fall asleep for 15 minutes

pros: whatever you need that for

cons: they wake up if you touch them

the ability to make fish explode
